title: Boom Juice
description: A raw bar and a juice bar. A raw foods/juice retail shop at Dallas Farmers Market. All items are 100% vegan, raw, organic and paleo vegan except the cheesecake which contains honey. All juices are made using the Norwalk cold pressed juicer. Also has superfood smoothies. Offers grab 'n go case of raw breakfast food, salads, and desserts.
